channel.title: NoClip Works For All [562]
channel.description:
Hi,
The topic subject says it all. I'm running a 562 server but i decided to change the source because the ban system isn't working. So i found a better one. But the problem is that noclip works for everyone. How can i fix this?

item.title: NoClip Works For All [562]
item.dc:creator: @laurent_248 laurent 248
item.description:
@laurent_248 wrote:

Are you using my source?

If yeah, I tryied to fix it many times but it’s in the client. And i hate coding client.

If u fix it, ur a pro.

Read full topic
